short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension lets you save tabs and recover them on any browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What is Tab Pad? Tab Pad is the simplest way to save chrome tabs in the cloud. Use the chrome extension to save the URLs of a window's tabs to a passcode in the system. Go to tabpad.me/{passcode} later to open those tabs again in any browser.
